attributes.action: Allow Fridays to be classed as Bank Holidays from now on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that in this country, Fridays - that being every Friday should now be given as a Bank Holiday.

Every week would be nice but I would settle for 1 in every 2.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
